data.description: interface to GNU gnats bugtracking daemon
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
gnatsperl is a collection of perl modules providing a perl
    interface to the gnatsd daemon (GNU gnats issue tracking system). It
    is intended to allow developers to more easily create tie-in
    applications to gnats.

    gnatsperl communicates with gnatsd over tcp/ip sockets and thus
    belongs in the Net namespace.
